review_data.title: Heer

review_data.title: A busy place at most times of the day
review_data.content: Cafeteria City is located in Oerlikons’ town center reachable with many options by public transit. There is a nice seating arrangement with marble tables and green padded chairs and a separate enclosed smoking/dining room. There is also a large sidewalk seating area for some good...More

review_data.title: Хороший кофетерий
review_data.content: Хорошее кафе, чтобы выпить кофе и перекусить. Кафе расположено не далеко от станции от которой мы добирались до центра города....More

review_data.title: Café saboroso
review_data.content: Café bem localizado, no centro da cidade, delicioso. O ambiente é muito bom e o atendimento bem legal. Gostei muito.

review_data.title: Shakes and Burgers
review_data.content: Has a very nice "American Diner" feel to it. Conveniently located across from Oerlikon train station and carries a wide selection of burgers, fries, and shakes.
